title: Wicked Fae
description: Sense8 meets the world of faeries in this new reverse harem fantasy romance.  Magic. Monsters. Music.  Vivid dreams have always plagued Ginevra, and they constantly star the same four magical people. She spent her childhood in and out of therapy until she learned to lie and hide the invisible friends who grew up with her and played with her every night. But lately, the dreams begin to bleed into her waking hours - talking to her, calling to her, teasing her. She just wants to focus on her career as a cellist, but she's losing the line between sleeping and waking and they refuse to leave her alone. They tell her she chose them. They tell her they need her. They tell her they're coming for her.  Don't miss out on this new series. Scroll up and one-click today!  ***IMPORTANT NOTE: This is a reverse harem novel where the leading lady doesn't have to choose between love interests. The series will have MM and FF content and is rated M due to language, violence, and steamy scenes. Not meant for anyone under the age of 18.
author: Helene Gadot
